verses.verse: And <S%H428>these<s%> are the countries <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5157>inherited<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5157>distributed<s%> for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to them.

By <S%H1486>lot<s%> was their <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> for the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> and for the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe.<s%>

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> on the <S%H5676>other<s%> <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan:<s%> but to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes,<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim:<s%> therefore they <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2506>part<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3588>save<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in, with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and for their <S%H7075>substance.<s%>

As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did,<s%> and they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal:<s%> and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, You <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H182><s%> me and you in <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea.<s%>

<S%H705>Forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was I when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me from <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%> to <S%H7270>espy<s%> out the <S%H776>land;<s%> and I <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as it was in my <S%H3824>heart.<s%>

Nevertheless my <S%H251>brothers<s%> that <S%H5927>went<s%> up with me made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4529>melt:<s%> but I <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>Surely<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> shall be your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and your <S%H1121>children's<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you have <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has kept me <S%H2421>alive,<s%> as he <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> even <S%H227>since<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H834>while<s%> the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%> and <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>see,<s%> I am this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old.<s%>

As <S%H5750>yet<s%> I am as <S%H2389>strong<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> as I was in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me: as my <S%H3581>strength<s%> was <S%H227>then,<s%> even so is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> for <S%H4421>war,<s%> both to <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and to <S%H935>come<s%> in.

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in that <S%H3117>day;<s%> for you <S%H8085>heard<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3588>how<s%> the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> were <S%H8033>there,<s%> and that the <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>fenced:<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be with me, then I shall be able to <S%H3423>drive<s%> them out, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

<S%H2275>Hebron<s%> therefore <S%H1961>became<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> that he <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7153>Kirjatharba;<s%> which Arba was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among the <S%H6062>Anakims.<s%> And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war.<s%>
